item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Hello Rhei
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: Rhei is a prototype of an electro-mechanical clock with a liquid display. Made by Damjan StankoviÄ, it took a full year and lots of passion, love, and commitment. This arduous project, created and executed in collaboration with Marko PavloviÄ and many other collaborators. Rhei is a dynamic installation, an animated sculpture, an idea expressed in the form of a minimalistic, digital clock. The base of the idea are magnets. They move beneath the glass of the display, and the black liquid moves As they say on hellorhei.com: âNever before has a liquid substance been unveiled in its pure, unrefined form and controlled in a manner which allows it to display tangible shapes. There is a middle ground between the analog and the digital sphere, where the rules of mechanics and the laws of nature come together in order to create a liquid illusion reminiscent of a contemporary, digital form.â Quite riveting.

item.title: Nest Thermostat
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: The design father of the iPod decided to get into the thermostat industry. The result is a meticulously designed thermostat that can monitor the temperature in your home - and help you save on energy bills, as well as the environment. The nest.com brilliantly describes how Nest affects energy use: âThe 3rd gen Nest Learning Thermostat does. It learns what temperature you like and builds a schedule around yours. Since 2011, the Nest Thermostat has saved over 4 billion kWh of energy in millions of homes worldwide.* And independent studies showed that it saved people an average of 10-12% on heating bills and 15% on cooling bills. So in under two years, it can pay for itself.â

item.title: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay A9
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: The Bang & Olufsen A9 is one of the most riveting wireless speakers made. A circular shape that rests on three legs is as minimal a statement on minimalism as can be. As Engadget puts it: âBang & Olufsen has never been one to shy away from intriguing design, and the BeoPlay A9 is no different. This AirPlay-capable speaker stands out among other speakers with its unique circular shape that also doubles as a volume control, and TrustedReviews calls the A9's design "minimalist in styling yet attention grabbing in its shape." Its round form houses five speakers that create a sound t-break refers to as "mesmerizing," with TrustedReviews being pleased with "the quality of its sound reproduction." The BeoPlay A9 avoids the 'form over function' clichÃÂ© by not only looking modern and interesting, but by also providing an enjoyable audio experience. However, at $2700 this is a hard cost to justify when there are cheaper wireless options out there.â

item.title: Knog, and a new kind of bike bell
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: THE BRITISH INVENTOR John Richard Dedicoat designed the bike bell in the late 19th century. His visionâa simple rounded piece of metal with a small lever the rider flicks to produce a tinny âdingââhas endured for more than a century. Despite its basic form and, frankly, irritating sound, Dedicoatâs design has become the de-facto bike bell for old beaters and sleek road bikes alike. Hugo Davidson is not a fan of the bike bell. âNo one wants to put a $5 Chinese bell on an $8,000 carbon fiber road bike,â he says. Heâs got a point. Davidson is the co-founder of and lead designer at Knog, the Australian bike accessories company known for its ubiquitous bendy Frog light. The companyâs latest accessory is the Oi, a bike bell that doesnât look anything like a bike bell. Itâs a sleek bit of metal that wraps around the handlebar like a bracelet. The bell is something of a departure for a company that has, since its founding 14 years ago, focused largely on lights. It recently introduced the Oi on Kickstarter and already has raised nearly 30 times the funding it asked for. It seems thereâs a big demand for a bike bell that actually looks good.

item.title: Rose Gold iPhone SE
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: As it turns out, quite a few people prefer smaller phones. Yesterday at its keynote event, Apple revealed that 30 million people bought its 4-inch phones last year. Thatâs almost 8 percent of the 232 million phones Apple sold worldwide last year. And according to mobile analytics website Mixpanel, the iPhone 5s is currently the companyâs second most popular phone, second only to the iPhone 6 (and ahead of the 6s and 6 Plus). Obviously thereâs a market for smaller phones, one Apple would be silly to ignore. Phones have been trending large for almost five years now, and the iPhone 6âs 4.7-inch screen was Appleâs acknowledgement of that. Thereâs no denying the 6 and 6S have been a huge successâApple set all of its revenue, profit, and iPhone sales records after the bigger handset appeared in 2014. But the super-sized form factor drew consternation from people who werenât ready to trade in their smaller screens.

item.title: Vizio moves the TV into your Remote Control
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: VIZIO HAS BEEN owning the home entertainment market lately by selling excellent televisions for bargain prices, putting sub-$1,000 price tags on great sets with all the latest tech packed inside. The company is still at it: Vizioâs new 2016 P Series of TVs offer the same features found in the companyâs super-expensive Reference Series, but at more affordable pricing that starts at $1,000. If you donât need the extra dimming zones and sunshine-bright backlight systems of the $6,000-and-up Reference Series panels, the new P-series sets are a steal. These P-Series Vizios arenât just 4K TVs, theyâre HDR 4K TVs. HDR-capable sets can produce very bright highlights, making fireballs and shimmering water appear incredibly lifelike. They can also display inky blacks, making all the details in a dim scene really pop. Basically, HDR should be at the top of the New Things You Want In a TV list.

item.title: Mini DisplayPort to Dual-Link DVI Adapter
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: You can use an external display as your main workspace or to extend your desktop, or you can work in mirrored mode with a projector so you can view what your audience sees.
item.excerpt:encoded: Every Mac with a Mini DisplayPort allows you to connect an external display or projector using an adapter.

item.title: Apple Watch Magnetic Charging Dock
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: When docked on its side, your watch automatically goes into Nightstand mode, so you can also use it as your alarm clock. The Apple Watch Magnetic Charging Dock uses the same inductive charging connector that comes with Apple Watch. It charges both the 38mm and 42mm models. And it connects via the Lightning to USB Cable and Apple 5W USB Power Adapter.
item.excerpt:encoded: With the Apple Watch Magnetic Charging Dock, you can charge your Apple Watch in a flat position with its band open, or on its side.

item.title: Evutec Wood SI Snap Case for iPhone 6 Plus/iPhone 6s Plus
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: Featuring a shock-resistant TPU lining, the result is a superbly tough case with a remarkably thin profile.
item.excerpt:encoded: Taking iPhone protection to new heights, the Evutec Wood SI case for iPhone is crafted from responsibly sourced wood fused with a protective Dupont Kevlar outer shell.

item.title: DJI Phantom 4 Camera Drone
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: Not only does it fly intelligently with a tap and automatically create seamless tracking shots, it can autonomously avoid obstacles and do much more.
item.excerpt:encoded: The DJI Phantom 4 is the smartest flying camera drone from DJI, allowing you to capture superb aerial images on your iPhone or iPad.

item.title: Nest Cam Home Security Camera
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: Night Vision LED sensors mean you can see the whole room clearly even at night. Quick and easy to set up, the Nest Cam has a mic and speaker so you can hear what's going on and talk back using the Nest App.
item.excerpt:encoded: The Nest Cam home security camera lets you monitor your home from anywhere, using your iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, or Mac. Stay connected with a super-clear 1080p HD video stream and get alerts if anything happens.

Image alignment

The rest of this paragraph is filler for the sake of seeing the text wrap around the 150x150 image, which is left aligned. As you can see the should be some space above, below, and to the right of the image. The text should not be creeping on the image. Creeping is just not right. Images need breathing room too. Let them speak like you words. Let them do their jobs without any hassle from the text. In about one more sentence here, we'll see that the text moves from the right of the image down below the image in seamless transition. Again, letting the do it's thang. Mission accomplished! And now we're going to shift things to the right align. Again, there should be plenty of room above, below, and to the left of the image. Just look at him there... Hey guy! Way to rock that right side. I don't care what the left alignedÂ image says, you look great. Don't let anyone else tell you differently.Â In just a bit here, you should see the text start to wrap below the right aligned image and settle in nicely. There should still be plenty of room and everything should be sitting pretty. Yeah... Just like that. It never felt so good to be right.

One big great image

item.title: Parrot Mini Drone Airborne Cargo
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: Amazing acrobatics With a single swipe of your finger, watch as it turns 90Â° and 180Â° and performs 360Â° forward and backward flips. Designed for safe flying, it's fitted with a propeller circuit-breaker in case of collision. FreeFlight 3 app Featuring a sophisticated stabilisation and autopilot system, the Airborne Cargo is easy to pilot with touch controls using the FreeFlight 3 app. Build your own flying robot Customize your Mini Drone Airborne Cargo by changing the look with stickers or attaching bricks and action figures. Featuring compartments to hold tiny objects, it's easy to get creative. - Perform forward, backward and sideway flips with the touch of a finger - Turns 90Â° and 180Â° and performs 360Â° forward and backward flips with one swipe - Take aerial photos with the built-in mini-camera - An accelerometer and gyroscope inside the Rolling Spider measure and analyze its every movement - Ultra-sophisticated technology make it one of the most stable quadricopters on the market - Free Fall Take-Off allows engines to start up automatically when you release drone into air - Comes with two shields and a set of stickers for customising - Easy piloting with touch controls via the FreeFlight 3 app
item.excerpt:encoded: Featuring a sophisticated stabilisation and autopilot system, the Airborne Cargo is easy to pilot with touch controls using the FreeFlight 3 app.

item.title: Harman Kardon Esquire Mini Bluetooth Wireless Speaker
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
The speaker's uni-body structure is finely crafted from premium materials. Esquire Mini also offers the convenience of Bluetooth wireless, as well as the exceptional sound that comes from dual, high-performance drivers and an enhanced bass port design.
- Craftsmanship, elegance, and performance in an all-in-one speaker - Ultra-thin for true portability - High-fidelity, wireless Harman Kardon sound with dual, high-performance drivers and extended bass response - Wireless Bluetooth stereo streaming - Versatile, dual-microphone conferencing system with echo and noise cancellation technology - Rechargeable battery with up to eight hours of play - USB port for charging external devices
item.excerpt:encoded: Designed to more than satisfy on-the-go professionals, Harman Kardon's Esquire Mini wireless speaker lets you easily share high-quality audio from your iPhone or iPad.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Clock with a liquid display, created by Damjan StankoviÄ

item.title: Studio Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - Matte Black
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded: The music moves with you With this over-ear headphones the music on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod can truly roam free. The Bluetooth stays connected up to 30 feet away so you easily move about and keep the music going. Take calls, skip songs, and change the volume right from the headphone. - The new Beats Studio is now wireless - Beats Acoustic Engine uses precision sound to deliver music the way artists want it to be heard - Rechargeable battery lasts 12 hours while connected through Bluetooth and up to 20 hours when plugged into your iOS device - Adaptive Noise Canceling blocks out the world in two modes - Battery fuel gauge lets you know how much power is left
item.excerpt:encoded: With this over-ear headphones the music on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod can truly roam free. The Bluetooth stays connected up to 30 feet away so you easily move about and keep the music going.

item.title: BoseÂ® SoundLinkÂ® Color Bluetooth Speaker
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
The BoseÂ® SoundLinkÂ® Color Bluetooth speaker delivers performance so full and lifelike that every song on your iPhone or iPad can inspire youâwherever you are, whatever youâre doing. SoundLink Color is small, durable, and simple to useâwith voice prompts that talk you through Bluetooth pairing. And the rechargeable lithium-ion battery lets you play music for up to eight hours, unplugged.
Proprietary Bose technologies deliver clear, full-range sound unexpected from a compact speaker Bluetooth technology lets you wirelessly connect to your iPhone, iPad, or other Bluetooth device Voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing, so itâs easier than ever Rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides up to eight hours of playing time Auxiliary input allows you to connect devices without Bluetooth technology that use a standard 3.5 mm audio output Charger lets you charge from most USB power sources or a wall outlet Available in a selection of colors
item.excerpt:encoded: The BoseÂ® SoundLinkÂ® Color Bluetooth speaker delivers performance so full and lifelike that every song on your iPhone or iPad can inspire youâwherever you are, whatever youâre doing.

item.title: Marshall Kilburn Portable Wireless Speaker
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
The Marshall Kilburn portable speaker gives you the freedom to play music on the road from your iPhone, iPad, and iPod. With up to 25 hours of portable playing time, connect wirelessly via Bluetooth and stream music directly to your Kilburn with no wires attached. Staying true to the Marshall legacy, classic design features include a vintage-looking front fret grille and the iconic script logoâso it looks as good as it sounds.
Easy connectivity with Bluetooth compatibility and a 3.5mm jack Up to 25 hours of portable playing time Compact size is lightweight and portable Analog knobs allow you to fine-tune controls to your personal preferences Classic Marshall aesthetic with script logo and vintage-looking fret grille
item.excerpt:encoded: The Marshall Kilburn portable speaker gives you the freedom to play music on the road from your iPhone, iPad, and iPod. With up to 25 hours of portable playing time, connect wirelessly via Bluetooth and stream music directly to your Kilburn with no wires attached.

item.title: Beats Solo2 Wireless On-Ear Headphones - Gold
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
• Pair and play wirelessly with iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, or iPod
  • Up to 30 foot Bluetooth range
  • Fine-tuned acoustics for clarity, breadth, and balance
  • 12-hour rechargeable battery with Fuel Gauge to indicate charge level
  • Built-in mic and on-ear controls for taking calls and controlling music
  • Durable and compact folding design for easy portability
item.excerpt:encoded: Immerse yourself in an emotional sound experience. The Solo2 Wireless has a dynamic and wide range of sound with a natural clarity. The earcup padding buffers outside noise, bringing you closer to what the artist intended you to hear. Regardless of what kind of music youâre into, you'll feel the crisp, balanced sound in your Solo2 Wireless.

item.title: Misfit Speedo Shine Sleep and Activity Monitor
item.dc:creator: sinisakomlenic
item.content:encoded:
Made from durable aircraft-grade aluminium, Speedo Shine is waterproof to 164 feet and can track a swimmer's lap count, distance and calories burned with industry-leading accuracy. Download the Misfit app and track running, walking, cycling, and more with easy-to-to read daily fitness data. Lightweight and comfortable, it can be worn on the wrist or as a clip anywhere on the body.
Waterproof to 164 feet Measures swim distance and counts laps with industry-leading accuracy Track swimming, running, walking, cycling and more Automatically monitors light and deep sleep patterns Long-lasting replaceable battery never requires charging Syncs wirelessly with the Misfit app to turn your sleep and activity data into easy-to-read charts Halo of 12 LED lights displays your daily progress levels and also functions as a watch
item.excerpt:encoded: Designed with swimmers in mind, the Speedo Shine syncs with the free Misfit app on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch to track both your activity and sleep.
